blog.description:
Hispanic | 21 | Bi | She/her

I will protect Tony Stark, Bucky Barnes, and Loki with my life.

We don’t hate anyone on this blog!!! So if you’re anti- anyone then stay away.

Warnings: I rant a lot.

tags: Thank you for reading my exposé
on the bullshit in this fandom
summary:
Tonight on Hypocrisy Tumblr: 
Apperantly Peter B. Parker (from Into the Spider-Verse) is not critiqued for being a father/mentor...
body:
Tonight on Hypocrisy Tumblr:

Apperantly Peter B. Parker (from Into the Spider-Verse) is not critiqued for being a father/mentor figure to Miles Morales even though Miles already *gasp* has a father in his life!

It’s almost like the idea of having more than one father figure is… acceptable. But only when it doesn’t involve Tony Stark.

reblog.comment:

summary: STANNER - 10/?? (Happy Holidays Edition) All started with an intense look... A nervous look... A handshake... Kind words......
caption:
STANNER - 10/?? (Happy Holidays Edition)

All started with an intense look… A nervous look… A handshake… Kind words… Working together… Hand to hand… My friend, my partner… My special one… Our special holidays… Now separated by all the vast space… With that hug we gave… always in my head. I love you so much… I need your hand… My Big Guy.

summary: now I'm one step closer (to being two steps far from you)
title: now I'm one step closer (to being two steps far from you)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2LurHye

by merthurxmalec

He had walked into the compound, his eyes scanning frantically for brown curls and chocolate eyes.

For home.

Home was not a concept available to him, not anymore.

~

Steve Rogers is on Earth wishing for a home that doesn’t exist anymore.

Tony Stark is in Space, not knowing if he is ever going to get home.

They both don’t know how to get back the home they lost.

Words: 2572, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen, M/M

Ask requests accepted for IRONSTRANGE headcanons and short fics. | I also do omegaverse IRONSTRANGE| Tony is a bottom , you can't change my mind.
Ironstrange only

tags: tony is so hurt & always crying
body:
Destined (ironstrange fic promotion)

Scene 2 leaked

The bedchamber was echoing the sounds of the Queen-Mother coughing, as her son poured water into a glass for her.

“Mother” Stephen handed over the glass of water to her as he sat on her bed carefully rubbing her back while she drank from the glass. His heart broke at sight of his mother, the once ever-so beautiful queen had no hair left in her scalp, she was sickly thin and dark circles rested beneath her eyes… She was tired… She had been sick for almost an year now… Her time was short, her liberation was close, maybe just a few more months, Stephen knew all this.. he studied healing.. He understood his mother’s condition… But he was not ready to let go..

“Stephen” his mother whispered as she lifted one of her arms. He took her arm into his hands “Yes mother?”

“how much more time?”

“I beg your pardon, mother?”

The queen smiled sadly, and looked down for a bit

“you know what I’m asking my little Ulysses, how much more time do I have?”

Tears pooled in Stephen’s eyes as his mother used his childhood nickname…“do not speak like that mother, I’m really working hard ..I really am.. I’ll come up with some medicine, I promise”

“maybe it’s time to consider.. stopping… Let it go Stephen .. Let me go my child” the Queen’s breathing became a little shaky

She looked towards the balcony from where the night sky was visible, “I miss him… *She looked back at Stephen* I miss your Father, it’ll be my pleasure to reunite with him again”

“but I’ll miss you” Stephen let his mother stroke his cheekbone on the left of his face as she said

“Stephen…. Will you not grant your dying mother a last wish my son?”

“anything mother, anything” Stephen’s voice was filled with helplessness

“ Please… Start looking for a companion… Get married Stephen, please my son I cannot look at you being alone all the time, it pains me”

“Mother?” Stephen gave his mother a confused expression lightly shaking his head “how could I get married, how could I even think of celebrating an event like that when you’re so si..

The Queen-Mother cut him off ” I’m a guest for a few days only son, I’ll leave soon…. Before I leave I want to experience the joy of getting my son wed, your Father was deprived from that joy, will you not give me that joy Stephen? I need to know that when I’m gone…. You’ll have someone who’ll take care of you… Bring you joy"

“when I leave, I can leave in peace that you’re happy, you have your own family, will you not give me that joy my son?”

Stephen stared at his mother… Then lowered his head on her chest and as her arms encircled him stroking his hair, he said" very well mother, very well… Everything will happen as you want, I’ll set out on finding myself a bride who will do right by this empire"

“All I care about is, them doing right by you , my Ulysses” his mother smiled and pressed a kiss on his hair.

title: vouchsafe
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2A6vuNV

by sagemb

Tony covered his face with both hands and screamed very gently. “Can I just bribe the school to let Peter in?“

blog.name: theserpentunderneathh
blog.title: Bicon
blog.description: "Look like the innocent flower but be the serpent underneath." Just a femme fatale who loves badass television.

summary: I wonder if CACW would’ve went a different route if Steve had sat Tony down earlier in a private setting and told him the truth...
body: I wonder if CACW would’ve went a different route if Steve had sat Tony down earlier in a private setting and told him the truth about Bucky and his parents. Like thoroughly explained that Bucky was not in control of his own actions and then dropped the murder bomb before giving him time to process the information before seeing Bucky again in person. Would that had worked? I’m not an expert on Tony Stark’s personality and nature so I’m honestly asking.

blog.name: captainkirkmccoy
blog.title: ad astra per aspera
blog.description:
Bree  ♠ xxvii ♣  New York  ♥
McKirk Outreach Director  ♦  
Star Trek ♠ Marvel ♣ Harry Potter ♥  The Blacklist ♣ Ask me for book recs ♥ Always accepting fic prompts ♦

summary: Hello! Can I request an MCU fic? I’d really like one where Tony is Jewish and no one realises till it’s actually Christmas. Or...
question: Hello! Can I request an MCU fic? I’d really like one where Tony is Jewish and no one realises till it’s actually Christmas. Or even just a nice heartwarming fic between Tony and Peter would be great! Thanks!
answer:
Peter found Tony in his workshop, blasting Metallica and eating–actually eating. Peter would have commented on it but instead he stayed just outside the doorway, door suspended as the facial recognition and handprint let him in but he didn’t enter.

“No, Dum-E, not like that. It’s about the spin. Why do I bother? Fri, calculate the probability of teaching Dum-E dreidel.”

“I don’t think you would like the odds, Boss.”

Tony blew a raspberry and then tossed a thin piece of chocolate in the ai, the wrapping gleaming in the workshop’s lighting. It was Gelt?

“Um, Mr. Stark?”

“Yeah, kid?” Tony spun around in the chair as Dum-E dropped the dreidel onto the floor. It skittered to a stop in front of U, who unsuccessfully tried and failed to retrieve it for his robot brother.

“Are you Jewish?”

“Born and raised. Well, kinda. Dad thought religion was worthless but Ma wanted me to know some tradition and structure that she loved and grew up on.” He shrugged.

“How come you didn’t tell anyone? You literally told Cap to cut down a tree with his hands and insisted we spend a shitton-”

“Language.”

“–On ornaments.” Peter rolled his eyes.

“You’re a kid. Kid’s should have Christmas if that’s what they want. I checked with Aunt May. You’re a dork for the holiday.”

“I’m a dork for spending time with family, which I thought we were doing upstairs but no one knew you didn’t celebrate and I’m sorry.”

“Hey, hey, kid, slow down. It’s okay. I didn’t tell anyone because I didn’t feel like it. I’m sorry I left you out. I didn’t mean to, okay?”

“But Hanukkah’s over, I would have spent it with you. Unless, well, I’m not Jewish.”

Tony gave him the smile that Clint had nicknamed his Dad smile–the proud, slightly sappy half upturned grin that he swore wasn’t a usual facial expression he was capable of and yet–there it was. “I would have loved that, Pete. Next year?”

“You could teach me dreidel now since Dum-E and U gave up.”

“Oh, thank God. I thought my secret strategy would die with me.”

“You could teach Pepper.”

Tony made a face. “Pepper abhors gambling and I play for a prize.”

“Money?” Peter asked, wondering why Tony would ever need more of it.

The older man chuckled. “No, underoos. Chocolate!”

Tony reached behind him and pushed a dragon’s hoard of gold chocolate forward on the workbench.

“This is the best gelt you can find. I bought the company after–when mom died.”

“Whoa.”

“Oh, yes. So get ready to watch and learn because I’m about to school you in the highly competitive, high stakes world of dreidel.”

“Sam says I’ve got beginner’s luck.”

“Sam’s never played against me.”

“Let’s see what you got, old man.”

Tony’s eyebrows rose. “You’re on, kid.”

by rosewitchx

there’s a dead spider outside miles’ window.
